author: cnbc.com
title: Key Energy Services Provides Fourth Quarter and Full-Year 2017 Earnings Release and Conference Call Information
text:
HOUSTON, Feb. 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Key Energy Services, Inc. (NYSE:KEG) will report fourth quarter and full-year 2017 financial results after market close on Monday, February 26, 2018, and Key management will host a conference call to discuss these results on Tuesday, February 27, 2018 at 10:00 a.m. CST.
Callers from the U.S. and Canada should dial 888-794-4637 to access the call. International callers should dial 352-204-8973. All callers should ask for the "Key Energy Services Conference Call" or provide the access code 5698079. The conference call will also be available live via the internet. To access the webcast, go to www.keyenergy.com and select "Investor Relations."
A telephonic replay of the conference call will be available on Tuesday, February 27, 2018, beginning approximately two hours after the completion of the conference call and will remain available for two weeks. To access the replay, call 855-859-2056 or 800-585-8367. The access code for the replay is 5698079. The replay will also be accessible at www.keyenergy.com under "Investor Relations" for a period of at least 90 days.
Contact:
West Gotcher, Investor Relations
713-757-5539
Source:Key Energy Services, Inc.
